refnamediv.para: This page lists all the functions to manipulate Scilab native objects containing polynomials

refsection.literal:
scilabVar
scilab_createPolyMatrix(
scilabEnv
env, const wchar_t* varname, int dim, const int* dims, int complex)
refsection.para: Create a polynomial matrix in varname with dim dimensions (dims[0], dims[1], ..., dims[dim-1]).
complex: 0 to real matrix or 1 to complex matrix

refsection.literal:

scilabEnv
env, const wchar_t* varname, int row, int col, int complex)
refsection.para: Create a matrix of polynomial in varname with 2 dimensions M(row, col).
complex: 0 to real matrix or 1 to complex matrix
